name: METAR/SPECI (US)
description: METAR/SPECI: US (NOAA) variant with altimeter in inches (A) and visibility in statute miles (SM)

auto.description: Fully automated observation without human intervention

windNotAvailable.description: Wind not available from automatic system (AUTO)

cavok.description: Ceiling And Visibility OK - vis ≥10km, no cloud <1500m/MSA, no CB/TCU, no sig wx

visibilityNotAvailable.description: Visibility not available from automatic system (AUTO)

visibilitySM.description: Visibility in statute miles (regional - North America)

visibilitySMNotAvailable.description: Visibility in statute miles not available (AUTO - North America)

rvr.description: Runway Visual Range with P/M prefix and U/D/N tendency

noWeather.description: Present weather not observable by automatic system

cloudBase.description: Cloud layer - amount + height without type

cloud.description: Cloud layer - amount + height in 100s ft + type

verticalVisibility.description: Vertical visibility in 100s ft when sky obscured

nsc.description: No Significant Cloud - no cloud <1500m/MSA, no CB/TCU

ncd.description: No Cloud Detected by automatic observing system

temperatureDewpointMissing.description: Temperature with missing dewpoint (dewpoint not available)

temperatureNotAvailable.description: Temperature/Dewpoint not available from automatic system (AUTO)

pressureInches.description: Altimeter setting in inches of mercury (inHg)

recentWeather.description: Recent weather since last report or last hour

rwy.description: RWY keyword for WS ALL RWY

waveHeight.description: Sea-surface temperature and significant wave height

nosig.description: No significant change expected in next 2 hours

becmg.description: Becoming - change expected at regular/irregular rate

nsw.description: No Significant Weather - end of weather phenomena in trend

cavok.description: Ceiling And Visibility OK → skip to temperature

examples: METAR KJFK 281056Z 32008KT 10SM SCT250 M02/M14 A3042 RMK AO2
METAR KLAX 281053Z 25010KT 6SM HZ SCT015 BKN025 18/12 A2998 RMK AO2
METAR KORD 281051Z 36012G18KT 1/2SM +SN FG VV008 M05/M07 A2985 RMK AO2
SPECI KATL 281045Z 18015G25KT 3SM TSRA BR BKN020CB OVC050 22/20 A2978
METAR KSFO 281056Z 29012KT 10SM FEW020 SCT200 15/08 A3012 NOSIG
METAR KDEN 281053Z 18008KT 10SM CLR 22/M04 A3025 RMK AO2
METAR KMIA 281050Z 09015G22KT 8SM -RA SCT025 BKN045 OVC080 26/23 A2992
